attributes.action: ALL MPs SHOULD BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR THIER ACTIONS WHILST IN POWER
attributes.additional_details: ALL MPs SHOULD BE ACCOUNTABLE FOR THIER ACTIONS WHILST IN POWER AS THEY ALL SEEM TO BLAME EACH OTHER FOR MAJOR FINACIAL ISSUES THAT AFFECT THIS COUNTRY AND THE TAX PAYER YET THEY ALWAYS WALK AWAY WITH A HEALTHY BANK ACCOUNT AND THE ABILITY TO MAKE MORE MONEY ON THE STOREY OF THIER IN-ABILITY TO FUNCTION AS AN M.P.
